ygData.subject: RE: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey there.. Im usually on evenings.. around 6-11 pacific time.. weekends saturday most of the day.. sunday for a while, till its time to hit the club at 3:00
ygData.messageBody:
Hey there.. Im usually on evenings.. around 6-11 pacific time.. weekends
saturday most of the day.. sunday for a while, till its time to hit the club
at 3:00 pacific time. Let me know when we can meet or put me on your friends
list. We can shat and you me and fentus right ? .. id love to have some new
friends.. also, even if not, i can tell you where is good for you.. etc..
and I'd love to help you out.

Reuben

Nate

-----Original Message-----
From: Joseph Normandin [mailto:josephn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 11:46 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Anti-Camping ?


From: Joseph Normandin <josephn@...>

Hey Reuben,

thanks, when do you usually play? I have a pretty solid schedual so I
know if i can be on or not. Let me know i'd like to see some cool places
and maybe make some money if not experience ;)

-joe

On Tue, 10 Aug 1999, Reuben Aguilar wrote:

> From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
> Hey there, Don't stress.. I was at that level a while ago.. and to solve
my
> urge for boredom. It was the travelling that made my way fun again. I went
> everywhere (well almost) and died a few times. I had fun and thats what my
> game is about.. Having fun.. with friends I made. Trust me travelling to
> places and testing your limits has got to be the best! Yes you die, and
you
> know dying is part of the game. Once I got over the fear of death I had
alot
> of fun. I mean I was not necessarily suicidal, I was cautious. I test out
my
> skills, learn, adventure and enjoy. Aren't you on the Rodcet Nife ? If you
> are, You are more than welcome to join me in my travels. Ill take care of
> u.. my friends and guildmates are wonderfull and your bound to have a good
> time no matter what. We are all higher levels though, so exp would be eeh
> for ya, but wed do our best to keep you alive and adventure as a team.
Thats
> that.. so im here for ya to cure your boredom blues
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: WAMPIR@... [mailto:WAMPIR@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 10:44 AM
> To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Anti-Camping ?
>
>
> From: WAMPIR@...
>
> In a message dated 8/10/99 1:37:08 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
josephn@...
> writes:
>
> << Jeez!
>
> I am a lvl 13 wizard and I need a shoulder to cry on. I have reached
that
> stage where I have bcome bored and frustrated by EQ. I can't find
quality
> poelpe to quest with, most that I have found before are way past me now
in
> level. I am so fucing sick of going to the same places and getting
hardly
> any expeirence, and spending half the time meditating. what do I
do!!!???
> Woe is me! how did you all get past this time? Is there anyplace I
> sbould go to get good exp or items? I dont ave anything cool or any
> latinum I am pathetic....|:( <snif>
>
> -joe >>
>
> First thing you need to do is loose the self pity...:-)
>
> Next Depending on your Class Race Lev. Do some traveling. Even if your a
> Darkelf at elv 13 you can go just about anywhere you want to. I'm not
> saying
> you can fight anywhere you want to. but you can go anywhere you want to.
> Find
> some people near your lev to fight with. Sometimes a shout is not the best
> way to find a group. exp at lower teens. Walk up on a group, and ask
nicely
> if they have room for another. You will meet the sh8t heads that are rude.
> Just ingor them, dont let them get to you. Above all elce have some fun.
> Even
> dieing can be fun if you look at it the right way.
>
> IMHO
> Wampir
